author: chfast
content: If we want option #1 it also means initcode validation consumes all provided gas.

author: chfast
content: I updated the proposed clarification. Does not look very bad. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6328

author: chfast
content: There is also one more check: the CREATE instruction coming from EOF must have EOF initcode.

author: _shemnon
content: I thought we were removing CREATE from inside EOF for v1?  Until a fuller solution could be examined?

author: axic3354
content: Yes, we just called it internally as "EOF v1.1" to not disturb testing efforts.

author: axic3354
content: We should discuss all this on the Wednesday call
